mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into customer (`name`, email, phone, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_by, created_at, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update customer set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_by = #{deletedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, email, phone, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_by, created_at, updated_at, updated_by from customer where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `name`, email, phone, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_by, created_at, updated_at, updated_by from customer
